mapper.select:
select i.org_id as id,count(*) as cardCount from CARD_INFO t ,sisp_public.t_org i where t.fkwd=i.org_code
and i.DISTINCT_ID in ('220203','220211','220202','220204')
and t.fkwd
#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.INPUT_TIME >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.INPUT_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as cardCount from CARD_INFO t,sisp_public.t_org i where t.fkwd=i.org_code and t.status in(6,7) and t.sync_status is null
and i.DISTINCT_ID in ('220203','220211','220202','220204')
and t.fkwd
#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.activetime >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.activetime <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as cardCount from Tempcard_detail t,sisp_public.t_org i where t.rkwd=i.org_id and status='01'
and i.DISTINCT_ID in ('220203','220211','220202','220204')
and t.rkwd
#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.update_TIME >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.update_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as cardCount from replacecard_detail t,sisp_public.t_org i where t.rkwd=i.org_code and status in('01','03')
and i.DISTINCT_ID in ('220203','220211','220202','220204')
and t.rkwd
#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.faka_time >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.faka_time <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select count(*) as makeCardCount,i.org_id as id from CARD_INFO t, sisp_public.t_org i where t.fkwd=i.org_code and t.fkwd =#{orgCode}
and t.INPUT_TIME >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.INPUT_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as grantCardCount from CARD_INFO t, sisp_public.t_org i where t.fkwd=i.org_code and t.fkwd =#{orgCode} and t.status in(6,7) and t.sync_status is null
and t.activetime >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.activetime <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as tempGrantCardCount from Tempcard_detail t, sisp_public.t_org i where t.rkwd=i.org_id and t.rkwd =#{branchId} and t.status='01'
and t.update_TIME >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.update_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select i.org_id as id,count(*) as nowGrantCardCount from replacecard_detail t, sisp_public.t_org i where t.rkwd=i.org_code and t.rkwd =#{orgCode} and t.status in('01','03')
and t.faka_time >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.faka_time <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by i.org_id

select d.name,count(1) as makeCardCount, nvl( (select tt.grantCardCount from (select count(1)as grantCardCount,d1.name from card_info t1,sisp_public.t_org i1,sisp_public.t_distinct d1 where t1.fkwd=i1.org_code and i1.distinct_id=d1.distinct_id and t1.status in(6,7) and t1.sync_status is null
and t1.bank = #{bank}
and t1.activetime >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t1.activetime <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by d1.name)tt where tt.name=d.name),0) as grantCardCount, nvl( (select tt2.tempGrantCardCount from (select count(1)as tempGrantCardCount,d2.name from tempcard_detail t2,tempcard_box b2,sisp_public.t_org i2,sisp_public.t_distinct d2 where t2.rkwd=b2.rkwd and t2.rkwd=i2.org_id and i2.distinct_id=d2.distinct_id and t2.status='01'
and b2.bank = #{bank}
and t2.update_TIME >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t2.update_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by d2.name)tt2 where tt2.name=d.name ),0)as tempGrantCardCount, nvl( (select tt3.nowGrantCardCount from (select count(1)as nowGrantCardCount,d3.name from replacecard_detail t3,sisp_public.t_org i3,sisp_public.t_distinct d3 where t3.rkwd=i3.org_code and i3.distinct_id=d3.distinct_id and t3.status in('01','03')
and t3.bank = #{bank}
and t3.faka_time >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t3.faka_time <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by d3.name)tt3 where tt3.name=d.name ),0)as nowGrantCardCount from card_info t ,sisp_public.t_org i,sisp_public.t_distinct d where t.fkwd=i.org_code and i.distinct_id=d.distinct_id
and t.bank = #{bank}
and t.input_time >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.input_time <= to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by d.name order by grantCardCount desc
select o.org_code as bank,o.distinct_id from sisp_public.t_org o,sisp_public.t_user u where o.org_id=u.org_id and o.parent_org_id in(0,1) and u.user_id=#{userId}
